componentDescription: The foundation for building custom-styled buttons.

propDescriptions.action: A ref for imperative actions. It currently only supports focusVisible() action.
propDescriptions.focusableWhenDisabled: If true, allows a disabled button to receive focus.
propDescriptions.slotProps: The props used for each slot inside the Button.
propDescriptions.slots: The components used for each slot inside the Button. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component. See Slots API below for more details.

root.description: Class name applied to the root element.

slotDescriptions.root: The component that renders the root.
